thread.title: Bera Recognizes Elk Grove Mail Carrier for Saving Woman on His Route (Ami Bera)
thread.title_full: Bera Recognizes Elk Grove Mail Carrier for Saving Woman on His Route (Ami Bera) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Bera Recognizes Elk Grove Mail Carrier for Saving Woman on His Route (Ami Bera)
text: ( Source : Ami Bera) Washington, D.C. - Congressman Ami Bera, M.D. recognized Elk Grove mail carrier Scott Gallegos today as he received the National Hero of the Year award for saving a woman on his route who had been shot. Gallegos was on
